alert.note: Alert for Chippewa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Chippewa County through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chippewa Falls, or 12 miles north of Eau Claire, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake Wissota around 455 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cadott. This includes U.S. Highway 53 between mile markers 97 and 106. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
